description: A large sabertooth cat sits under a tree, pointing to its long, sharp fangs while addressing a smaller sabertooth kitten. The scene presents an absurd domestic moment between prehistoric predators, where the adult is ostensibly explaining the obvious function of their distinctive tusks. A prehistoric human figure walks away in the background, seemingly unaware of the predatory lecture occurring nearby, adding a layer of situational irony to the educational moment.
caption: "And now for today	extquoteright{}s lesson. ... You	extquoteright{}ve probably been wondering what these are for."
